main.name: Iuliia Kudriashova
main.description: I have 12 years of experience as a French teacher and in this time I have worked with different students from 4 to 17 years old in two international schools in Europe and have given private lessons for adults with different language level.
main.bio:
I taught French as a foreign language to beginner, intermediate, and advanced students of various cultural and linguistic backgrounds in British international school of Kiev for one year. Through my teaching experiences and studies, I developed critical pedagogic and classroom management skills, along with a passion for teaching French.
I'm equipped with the Communicative Teaching Method. I apply this method in the classroom through interactive, student-centered activities that maximize “student talk time.” I scaffold my lessons so that they include pair and group work, as well as movement around the classroom. By engaging students in speaking, grammar, writing, listening, and reading and appealing to diverse learning styles, I help them improve their accuracy and fluency across key skill areas.
Since 2012 I have prepared students to pass the exams DELF A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 and TEFaQ for immigration to Canada in association with Alliance française.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
